definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="CurrentSharpLvl" type="Number">CurrentSharpLvl</variable><variable id="counter" type="Number">counter</variable><variable id="raytrace_distance" type="Number">raytrace_distance</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="493" y="24"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_add_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:LightningBlade</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">400</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="itemstack_remove_specific_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:LightningBlade</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
